SEARCH
Package Project1

Class Quilt

java.lang.Object
Project1.Quilt
public class Quilt extends Object
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ class Quilt File: Quilt.java Description Provides Quilt with methods, private instances, we handle code for extended price, for each of the 3 quilt types. We also provide a tax method as well Finally we provide a method to add everything together for the final price, which includes all quilts bought, as well as the added tax. Environment JDK 1.0.0_241; NetBeans IDE 17.0, MAC OS Monterey Course CS 141 ON1, Spring 2023, Edmonds History Log Updated from 4/24/2023 Date: April 24, 2023
